definitions.definition: The state or condition of being an idiot ; the quality of having an intelligence level far below average ; mental retardation ; intellectual disability .
Lack of intelligence or sense ; extremely foolish behaviour .
examples: The administrators, growing tired of such idiocy , put a new policy in place.
The list of his idiocies is seemingly interminable.

main_definition: ( dated , psychology , now derogatory ) The state or condition of being an idiot ; the quality of having an intelligence level far below average ; mental retardation ; intellectual disability .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) Lack of intelligence or sense ; extremely foolish behaviour .
( countable ) An idiotic act or utterance .
